page.title: 07Ascension Day Walk
page.content: Following a Crowcombe tradition, after our {Ascension Day Service }in Church the school and parents set out for the annual {Hill Walk.}A convoy of cars left us at {Crowcombe Park Gate. {Then}we started to walk and we followed {The Ridgeway Track}to{Hurley {Beacon.} Continuing along a narrow sheep path down{Somerton Combe ,we {came to the shady}boggy patch where we crossed the stream, sometimes getting our feet wet. In{Hodders Combe}Mrs Bendon was waiting with our packed lunch. After eating we paddled in the stream and played Hunt the Beanbag and the Ball. We then had a Scavenger Hunt under the trees and climbed up the banks beside the stream.Off to the {Bowling Green}at{Holford}and then the return car journey to {School.}It was a great day out.
